summary: Experienced Senior Web Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the design and product industry. Skilled in React, Javascript/Typescript, User Experience, E-commerce, Accessibility, and User Interface Development.
headline: Senior Engineer | React, Next.js, Typescript, GraphQL

position.title: Senior Software Engineer
position.description:
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement
 Shopify-based Direct-to-Consumer (DTC) e-commerce solutions using React.
- Led the front-end development of key features, ensuring adherence to the best
 practices and delivering responsive and performant user interfaces.
- Work closely with UX/UI designers to translate design concepts into functional and
 visually appealing components.
- Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, consistency, and compliance with
 coding standards.
- Improve site performance through optimization techniques, such as lazy loading,
 code splitting, and caching strategies.
- Actively participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies, providing accurate estimations and
 progress updates.

position.title: Senior Engineer
position.description:
Senior Engineer working closely with product and design on a new NFT startup product.

- Lead/Architect on new front-end features.
- Conducted technical interviews for front-end and design-related hires, led onboarding experience via pair programming.
- Introduced better developer experiences with tools such as webpack, prettier, eslint and code review processes.

position.title: Senior Engineer
position.description:
Lead Senior Web Engineer on Forbes Digital Assets, a greenfield subscription based Cryptocurrency app using NextJs, Node and Storybook.

- Lead/Architect on entire front-end stack
- Mentored a team consisting of 4 front-end engineers and had weekly 1:1s
- Managed expectations with stakeholders and product owners
- Worked closely with backend engineers
- Participated and shared knowledge at company lunch and learns

position.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
position.description:
- Lead/Architect on improving the Mulberry.js SDK that involved refactoring and developing new features to provide a more flexible API for retailers.
- Introduced new frontend workflows, tools, and best practices to limit technical debt and improve an existing codebase.
- Worked closely with product and design to lead development on new features for the customer/retailer/admin facing dashboard.
- Supported retailer integrations.

position.title: Senior Frontend Engineer - Contract
position.description: Research and Development on a Shopify app for Supergreat embeddable reviews using Node, NextJs, React, GraphQL, Polaris and KoaJs.

position.title: Senior Web Engineer
position.description:
Senior Frontend developer on United Airlines Plus Points upgrade product.

- Worked with a team of developers, designers and business analysts to build a tool to manage flight upgrades and integrate United Airlines' new PlusPoints system.
- Built reusable UI components with React, CSS modules and Storybook.
- Utilized React, Redux, Redux-Saga and ReSelect to handle complex business logic and asynchronous data/service integrations.
- Employed industry best practices, modularization, and linting to ensure maintainable quality codebases.
- Conducted code reviews to ensure standards and best practices.

position.title: Senior Web Engineer
position.description:
Senior Frontend developer on Value Retail.

- Worked with a team of developers and designers to build a content managed
website using Gatsby and Contentful for luxury shopping boutiques based in Europe
and Asia.
- Built reusable UI components with React, Styled Components and Storybook.
- Created automation scripts to handle data migrations using the Contentful API. - Conducted code reviews to ensure quality and best practices.
- Presented new features in weekly client demos.

position.title: Lead Front End Engineer
position.description:
Lead Frontend developer on Revlon and Almay products.

- Led the frontend team on the replatform and redesign of Revlon and Almay
websites.
- Made frontend architectural decisions and worked closely with backend engineers
to integrate into the Sitecore platform.
- Setup a complex build system with webpack to accommodate multiple sites themes, templates and components.
- Built reusable UI components with VueJS.
- Setup a local GraphQl server to mock data for rapid development.
- Conducted code reviews to ensure quality and best practices.
- Worked closely to integrate with third party vendors Shoppable and BazaarVoice.
- Front-end representation in sprint planning/forecasting and backlog grooming,
client demos and client meetings.
- Worked closely with the analytics and SEO team to create several custom utilities to
meet business requirements.
- Wrote technical memos and architectural design documents as client deliverables.

position.title: Lead Front End Engineer, Think with Google

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Lead Front End Engineer, Think with Google

position.description:
Lead Front-end developer on Think with Google product.

- Led the front-end team on the replatform and redesign of Think with Google.
- Made front-end architectural decisions and project setup using VueJs, VueX,
PostCSS, Vanilla JS and webpack.
- Conducted code reviews to ensure quality and best practices.
- Mentored junior developers, giving feedback and providing guidance for technical
and career growth.
- Integrated AMP, Google Optimize and several custom anaylitics utilities.
- Contributed to the backend by creating Django field migrations and basic model
updates.
- Wrote technical memos and architectural design documents as client deliverables.

position.title: Senior Web Engineer
position.description:
Senior Front-end developer on Think with Google Data Gallery product.

- Developed a search app for Think with Google using Angular, Google Closure Compiler JS and Jinja templating
- Worked with several microservices, including writing a custom atomic design style
library to be imported into each service.

position.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
position.description: Lead Frontend developer on The Aspen Institute, Aquafina and Disney Dream Up.

position.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
position.description: Senior Frontend Developer on projects including Facebook - State of Connectivity, Red Bull Studios, and various internal websites.

position.title: Technology Lead / Senior Frontend Engineer
position.description: Technical direction, planning and management. Mentoring and hiring for the development team. Project scoping and estimates, proposal and technical writing. Hands on development for fashion, luxury brands and real estate industries.

position.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
position.description:
Lead developer in charge of engineering and creating interactive accounts alongside the company’s founding partner, design and production team.
Was in charge of translating the client’s goal and Creative Director’s vision while executing it with the industry innovative standards and details.
Such accounts varying from updates to e-commerce rebuilds include Alexander Wang, Grandlife Hotels, Diane von Furstenberg, Marc Jacobs, Nicole Miller, Proenza Schouler, Tess Giberson, Vera Wang, Visionaire...

fullPositions.title: Freelance Web Developer
fullPositions.description: Front and back-end development of New York based art and design studio. I have created various works from television show Tim and Eric to clients like Doug Atkin, Sundance Channel, and Viva Radio.

fullPositions.title: Front End Developer / Design / Viva Radio
fullPositions.description: In charge of the front and back-end development of established fashion brand. Also in charge of company’s various projects including first in-house online radio station.

fullPositions.title: Freelance Front End Developer
fullPositions.description: Created illustrations and flash animations for various children’s media and broadcast.
